alert.note: Alert for Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 28 at 9:26PM PDT until October 29 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing to sub-freezing temperatures 29-32 expected. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco, and Lake San Antonio. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
